mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from mmso_1round where mcn_no = ${param1} and m1_enter=${param2} and m1_active = 0 and m1_round_ck = 2
select count(*) cnt from mmso_2round where mcn_no = ${param1} and m2_enter=${param2} and m2_active = 0 and m2_round_ck = 3
select * from mmso_comp_no order by mcn_no desc
select * from mmso_enter_field order by mef_idx desc

select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, m1.*, mm.m_birthday FROM mmso_1round m1, mmso_member2 mm, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where m1_active = 0 and m1_round_ck = 2 and m1.m1_memberno = mm.memberno and mcn_no = ${param1} and m1.m1_enter = ${param2} ) A order by m_birthday desc

select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, m2.*, mm.m_birthday FROM mmso_2round m2, mmso_member2 mm, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where m2_active = 0 and m2_round_ck = 3 and m2.m2_memberno = mm.memberno and mcn_no = ${param1} and m2.m2_enter=${param2} ) A order by m_birthday desc

select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, ent.* , m1_round_ck, m1_1roundpoint, m1_2roundpoint, m1_3roundpoint, m1_4roundpoint, m1_1roundtime, m1_2roundtime, m1_3roundtime, m1_4roundtime, m1_idx FROM mmso_enter_test ent, mmso_1round m1, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ent_active = 0 and ent.ent_idx = m1.ent_idx and ent.mcn_no = ${param1} and ent.ent_enter = ${param2} ) A order by ent_birthday desc
mapper.update: update mmso_1round set m1_round_ck = 2 where m1_idx = #{m1_idx}
update mmso_1round set m1_1roundpoint = #{m1_1roundpoint}, m1_2roundpoint = #{m1_2roundpoint}, m1_3roundpoint = #{m1_3roundpoint}, m1_4roundpoint = #{m1_4roundpoint} where m1_idx = #{m1_idx}
mapper.select: select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, ent.* , m2_round_ck, m2_1roundpoint, m2_2roundpoint, m2_3roundpoint, m2_4roundpoint, m2_1time, m2_2time, m2_3time, m2_4time, m2_idx FROM mmso_enter_test ent, mmso_2round m2, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ent_active = 0 and ent.ent_idx = m2.ent_idx and ent.mcn_no = ${param1} and m2.m2_enter = ${param2} ) A order by ent_birthday desc
mapper.update: update mmso_2round set m2_1roundpoint = #{m2_1roundpoint}, m2_2roundpoint = #{m2_2roundpoint}, m2_3roundpoint = #{m2_3roundpoint}, m2_4roundpoint = #{m2_4roundpoint}, m2_1time = #{m2_1time}, m2_2time = #{m2_2time}, m2_3time = #{m2_3time}, m2_4time = #{m2_4time} where m2_idx = #{m2_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into mmso_2round (b_idx, m2_name, m2_enter, m2_cname, m2_1roundpoint, m2_2roundpoint, m2_3roundpoint, m2_4roundpoint, m2_1time, m2_2time, m2_3time, m2_4time, m2_round_ck, ent_idx, m2_memberno, m2_active, mcn_no) values(#{b_idx},#{m2_name},#{m2_enter},#{m2_cname},#{m2_1roundpoint},#{m2_2roundpoint},#{m2_3roundpoint},#{m2_4roundpoint},#{m2_1time},#{m2_2time},#{m2_3time},#{m2_4time},2,#{ent_idx},#{m2_memberno},0,#{mcn_no})
mapper.update: update mmso_2round set m2_round_ck = 3 where m2_idx = #{m2_idx}
mapper.select: select A.* from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, ent.*, m3_1roundtime, m3_1roundpoint, m3_2roundpoint, m3_idx FROM mmso_enter_test ent, mmso_3round m3, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ent_active = 0 and ent.ent_idx = m3.ent_idx and ent.mcn_no = ${param1} and m3.m3_enter = ${param2} ) A order by ent_birthday desc
mapper.insert: insert mmso_3round(b_idx, m3_enter, m3_name, m3_cname, m3_1roundtime, m3_1roundpoint, m3_2roundpoint, ent_idx, m3_memberno, m3_active, mcn_no) values(#{b_idx}, #{m3_enter}, #{m3_name}, #{m3_cname}, #{m3_1roundtime}, #{m3_1roundpoint}, #{m3_2roundpoint}, #{ent_idx}, #{m3_memberno}, 0, #{mcn_no})
